title: Space Pioneer raises $350 million as China’s commercial launch boom accelerates
summary:
Space Pioneer has secured around $350 million in new funding rounds to support its Tianlong-3 rocket and next-generation launch vehicle and engine development.

summary:

title: Gravity assists: trading energy with the planets
summary: Is there life on Terran V? Join the adventure to the fictional planet and find out what it takes to reach the farthest frontiers of deep space.

title: SpaceX launches final Version 2 Starship-Super Heavy rocket
summary: This was the fifth and final flight of this iteration of the rocket, which has been marred by a number of setbacks. The first Starship Version 3 is expected to debut in 2026.

title: Another Successful Starship Test Flight as SpaceX Readies a New Version
summary: SpaceX achieved a second successful Starship test flight in a row this evening. Integrated Flight Test-11 or IFT-11 lifted off from Starbase, Texas and splashed down in the Indian Ocean […]

title: Starship successfully completes 11th flight test
summary:
SpaceX successfully completed the final flight of version 2 of Starship on Oct. 13, performing in-flight tests as the company prepares to introduce an upgraded version of the reusable rocket.
The post Starship successfully completes 11th flight test appeared first on SpaceNews.

title: JPL Lays Off Another 550 Workers

title: Surprise Chinese launch sends Shiyan-31 experimental satellite into orbit
summary:
China conducted an orbital launch Monday with no apparent advance indication, successfully sending the Shiyan-31 remote sensing test satellite into orbit.

title: More layoffs at JPL
summary:
NASA’s Jet Propulsion Laboratory will lay off 550 employees this week, the latest round of job cuts at the space science center.
